程序包 org.am21.client.view

类 ClientView

java.lang.Object
org.am21.client.view.ClientView
public class ClientView extends Object
This class is used to store the client view of the match

      public static String[][] gameResults
      gameResults legend : for i in players.size() : i as player index [i][0] - Player name [i][1] - Common Goal points [i][2] - Personal Goal Points [i][3] - Shelf Group Points [i][4] - Eventual Endgame token or null (if no token for the player) [i][5] - Total Score; [players.size()][0] - Winner name or null (if no winner)

  • 方法详细资料

    • setFullViewVariables

      public static void setFullViewVariables(String json, int playerIndex)
      Once the JSON is received, it is parsed and the data is stored in the corresponding variables the key strings of get methods are generated automatically, check them first when you get a wrong answer
      参数:
      json - the JSON string received from the server
      playerIndex - the index of the player who receives the JSON

    • getPlayerIndex

      public static int getPlayerIndex(String player)
      get the index of the player in the list use this index to map other player data in other lists
      参数:
      player - the name of the player
      返回:
      the index of the player in the list
